entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `dotnet nuget push --skip-duplicates` synonym for `--skip-duplicate` #41289
  • [Pipelines] Failed to Sync VMR Due to R2R Patch #41285
  • Add `dotnet nuget push --dry-run` #41284
  • Error during dotnet workload restore: Authenticode Signature Verification Failed #41286
  • Container tests started failing with the runtime insertion #41272
  • MU brings newer version of Microsoft.AspNetCore.App without corresponding version of Microsoft.NETCore.App #41277
  • [NetSDKE2E][ARM64]Although we installed the .netcoreapp 3.1 runtime, Test still executed failed and show "You must install or update .NET to run this application...". #41258
  • [NETSDKE2E]"Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly..." show in Output after running "dotnet test --arch x86." #41256
  • The latest .NET 9.0 SDK form designer cannot load #41250

Closed

  • How to integrate dotnet/installer into SDK and download the latest unpublished preview version, such as SDK release 9.0.100-preview6.xxxx for macOS's pkg file? #41137

PullRequests

Created

  • Increment branding to allow for razor hotfix #41287
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41278
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix Aspire version to Preview 2 version #41274
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2463523 #41254
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix Aspire version to Preview 2 version #41275
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Use `src/<repo>/` as regex #41281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix build-configuration.json upload #41273
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix license scan test results path for trx files #41255
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview5] Fix localization in .NET Workload Information Display #41225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
